exchangeLuckyballComment: Uwahlengile amaphuzu akho ukuze uthole Ibhola Lenhlanhla.
luckyDrawUseBallComment: Usebenzise Ibhola Lenhlanhla ukuze ungene ku-Lucky Draw.
partnerMailContents1: Sicela uhlole amadokhumenti adingekayo ukuze agunyazwe uzakwethu bese uthumela impendulo ngefayela elinamathiselwe!
partnerMailContents3:
Sicela unamathisele ikhophi yekhadi lakho le-ID noma iphasipoti
ukuze uqinisekise ubunikazi bozakwenu.
partnerMailContents5:
Sicela uhlole amadokhumenti nolwazi oludingekayo
ukuze uthole imvume kazakwethu futhi usithumelele impendulo!
partnerMailContents6: (Uhlobo lokwenziwe, inombolo yomzila, inombolo ye-akhawunti, igama lokuqala lomphathi we-akhawunti, igama eliphakathi, isibongo, inombolo yocingo yomamukeli, njll.)
partnerMailContents8:
Sicela usithumelele inombolo yocingo lapho ungatholakala khona
ukuxhumana nomlingani wakho.
partnerMailContents9:
Sicela uthumele impendulo yakho nge-imeyili ku-partner@buflexz.com .
Ngemuva kokuthi ithimba lokusebenza lihlole impendulo, ukuhlolwa kozakwethu nokugunyazwa kuzocutshungulwa.
authMailContents3: Ukhiye wokuqinisekisa ukhishelwe ukufakazela ubuqiniso be-imeyili.
authMailContents4:
Sicela ufake inombolo yokuqinisekisa enezinhlamvu eziyisi-6 ngokuqondile ekufakazeni ubuqiniso
ifasitela ngaphakathi kohlelo lokusebenza noma kopisha futhi unamathisele inombolo yokuqinisekisa.
authMailContents5:
Le imeyili ngeyokuthumela kuphela.
Izimpendulo azinakwenzeka, ngakho-ke uma unemibuzo noma iziphazamiso,
sicela usithinte ngesikhungo samakhasimende ngaphakathi kohlelo lokusebenza lwe-BUFLEXZ.
